MUJEEB T.K, AGED 36 YEARS S/O.MOIDEEN KUTTY, KOTTUVAYAL, KALLAPARA P.O -673 631 FEROKE, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT. R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.SAREENA GEORGE R2 BY ADV. SRI.A.V.ANVAR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Plier ss El ie cre Bae 2014/KER/207 Cr1.MC.No. 19 of 2014 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE-A1: TRUE COPY OF THE FIR, FIS, FINAL REPORT AND CHARGE SHEET IN CRIME NO.168/2012 OF FEROKE POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE-A2: TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN IN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS : NIL /TRUE COPY/ P. A. TO JUDGE Pn HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. NLD Dated this the 2 day of January, 2014 ORDER Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents. 2. Accused Nos.1 to 7 in Crime No.168/2012 of the Feroke Police Station now pending as C.C.No.575/2013 before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-VI, Kozhikode are the petitioners. The petition is filed seeking to quash further proceedings against the petitioners in C.C.No.575/2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-Vl, Kozhikode. 3. The offences alleged are punishable under Sections 341, 323, 324 read with Section 34 of IPC. 4. The learned counsel on both sides submit that the dispute between the parties have been amicably settled and having regard to the resolution of the disputes between the parties, continuance of the criminal prosecution against the petitioners is an avoidable irritant. In view of the settlement arrived at between the parties, the Cril.M.C is disposed of quashing further proceedings against the petitioners in C.C.No.575/2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-VI, Kozhikode. Sd/- HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE. AV
